item.description:
see a film or two; I have a few in mind... a pair of fun ones... THE PRINCESS BRIDE... SNEAKERS... HOOSIERS... THE USUAL SUSPECTS... i mentioned the Princess Bride to someone, and they'd never seen it. Rob Reiner's film is 25 yrs old, and a classic. includes Billy Crystal, Andre the Giant, Manny Patankin, Fred Savage, Peter Falk, and others in comedic roles. I could run it from my house or someone with more seating space have a good TV? Anyone with suggestions? Suggest a date. A Friday night, or a Saturday afternoon and evening for a double header??

 

Can fit 15 comfortably seated on couch, chairs, and on floor... after that, a few more chairs can be place behind the couch, etc. 

have to set up a waiting list.. dont know how yet
item.name: Get together and watch a film or two, have some eats.
